projects.title: Verbello
projects.description: This is a language learning platform designed for native English speakers to learn Spanish, French, German, Italian, and Portuguese.

projects.title: SupplyChainApp
projects.description: A small supply chain application that displays a list of companies and their multiple locations marked on a map. On clicking a specific location, the map marker flies to and highlights the selected location. The app has backend APIs written in Python using Flask, a frontend with two pages coded in React and map integration using React Leaflet. It is containerized using Docker.

projects.title: LanguageDB
projects.description: Developed a language learning application using SQL for database management. The application facilitates effective language acquisition by offering a variety of interactive learning modules. I worked on writing SQL queries, stored procedures, triggers, user defined functions.
